mapper.select: select * from assess_bclient_check where status=#{status} and assessid=#{assessid} limit 1
select * from assess_bclient_check where assessid=#{assessid} order by dt_add desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into assess_bclient_check( id, assessid, status, dt_add, dt_edit, mid_add, del_tag, mid_edit, remark )values( #{id}, #{assessid}, #{status}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{mid_add}, #{del_tag}, #{mid_edit}, #{remark} )
